mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM T_BOARD INNER JOIN TB_MANAGE ON T_BOARD.TBM_NO = TB_MANAGE.TBM_NO WHERE T_BOARD.TB_DEL = 1
AND TB_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
mapper.update: UPDATE T_BOARD SET TB_HIT = TB_HIT + 1 WHERE TB_NO = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT T.TB_NO, M.MEM_NM, T.TB_TITLE, T.TB_CON, T.TB_FILE, TO_CHAR(T.TB_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TB_DT, T.TB_HIT, T.TB_UP FROM T_BOARD T INNER JOIN MEM M ON T.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND T.TB_NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BOARD(TB_NO, TBM_NO, MEM_NO, TB_TITLE, TB_CON,TB_FILE, TB_UP) VALUES(NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 2, #{mno}, #{title}, #{con}, #{NFile}, #{upbtn})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_BOARD SET TB_DEL = 0 WHERE TB_NO = #{no}
